This site presents the results of on-going research.
The work is being supported by NSF (grants CNS-1351089 and CNS-1254035), DARPA (contract #FA8650-11-C-7190), a joint Columbia/Stanford Brown Institute grant, and Google and Microsoft gifts. All views and commentaries belong to the authors alone and may not be shared by the funding parties.
